author: olegk
msg: HTTPCLIENT-1120: AbstractPoolEntry to throw InterruptedIOException instead of plain IOException; HttpRequest to be added to the execution context prior to attempting to open connection (in case of a connect failure the retry handler can make use of the HttpRequest object bound to the context)

msg: HTTPCLIENT-1120: moved test cases for abort handling to TestAbortHandling
